name: .SKTZ
summary: Learn about .SKTZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an SKTZ file with Sony Sketch (Android, iOS). While Sony Sketch is no longer listed in Google Play or the App Store, you can still install it on Android devices by downloading it from a reputable APK mirror site (such as APKMirror).

Since SKTZ files are Zip-compressed, you can rename the .sktz file extension to .zip, and then extract its contents with a Zip utility, such as Corel WinZip or Apple Archive Utility. This structure makes it possible to manually access and analyze the components of a Sony Sketch project, even without the original app.
Sony Sketch can convert SKTZ files to other image formats, such as .JPEG, .SVG, and .PSD.
